data.title: Visit with family
data.text: Stopped in for lunch. Burgers and fries were excellent, as were the shakes. Would definitely eat there again!

data.title: Sandwiches and burger place
data.text: I like their smoothies and burgers. Fries are good as well. Mostly go there for an evening snack. They have a foosball table, so good hang out place with friends.

data.title: Disappointing
data.text: Upon returning to EWR we drove out of our way off I-95 to visit Yale University and try the much acclaimed new burger place, Shake Shack.  SS is right down town by the University and parking is the first negative issue; it's limited.  Upon entering SS, the restaurant is trendy nice décor, but the order lines and food pickup system is much like any fast food joint.  It's a somewhat limited menu with burgers, but they do offer adult beverages.  By far my biggest disappointment was the food prices; two people ordered two basic cheeseburgers, two crinkle fries, and two shakes, and the price was around $28.00.  The food was tasty but not enough to make me want to return.

data.title: Yummy and fun
data.text: I am not a fan of burgers and fries, but Shake Shack makes them both to my liking. My students and I visited to celebrate our wins at the Yale Speech and Debate Tournament. The kids had tried to eat here for days but the lines were always too long. We lucked out on Sunday night. My meal was delicious and well-priced, as expected. The kids loved it.

data.title: Shroom Burger 👌👌👌
data.text:
Crispy and enticing.. great service and money's worth for sure...
Tried in New York Madison Square but the best part here is that I didn't have to wait in line...

data.title: Local outlet of New York City Concept
data.text: Shake Shack is a proven concept of premium /gourmet fast food that started at Madison Square Park in Manhattan about 10 years ago. It is led by Danny Meyer, one of the leading restaurant owners in New York City.  The menu is standardized across locations.  I love the 'shroom burger which is a large portobello mushroom with cheese on a bun.  There are a range of burgers and sandwiches and special treats called concretes.  This location is in the heart of New Haven, right near Yale University and walking distance to the Yale University Art Gallery and the Yale Repertory Theater.

data.title: The Black and White Shake
data.text: I've never eaten here.  The only thing I've ever had from the Shake Shack is the Black and White Shake with whipped cream, but this is the best shake I have ever had.  Not to be missed!  Service can be very slow, however, so be prepared to wait.

data.title: Mmmmm
data.text:
Stopped here for lunch with the kids....
Always a great meal and don't forget to order some of the frozen custard!!Mmmmmm!

data.title: Stopped In For Dessert
data.text: Stopped in for dessert after dinner. Bought 4 shakes and two root beer floats for $35. The shakes are tiny and the floats were two inches below the top of the cup. Taste was good, but not a good value.

data.title: Delicious food, long wait
data.text: Was passing through New Haven and wanted a MSG experience. Their burgers are amazing. Food did not disappoint but wait time was almost 30 minutes from arriving to getting my take out order.

data.title: Taste the same awesomeness in DC, Boston, and now New Haen
data.text: Nice ambient for family and food is awesome as always...if you have not try Shake Shack, you never though burger can be this good ;)

data.title: 'Shroom & Shake
data.text:
If you want to have a huge burger with a giant cup of shake, this is not the place to visit. I go here for their melt-in-the-mouth 'shroom burger and coffee shake for occasional treat. 
While I can't justify paying a high price for "just" a burger too often, the tummy does crave what it craves, therefore I shall return.

data.title: Really good
data.text: First time ever at a Shake Shack and everything was really good! We will definitely visit again.  My husband and I each had a Shack Burger and it was really delicious. I had a chocolate shake hit my chocolate craving and the fries were perfect!

data.title: Yum!
data.text: Great food and great service. Just as good as the original. We stopped in late night after checking out the campus. You can't go wrong here with a burger and fries! And of course a shake!

data.title: Be carefull ehen order!
data.text: I was surprised then ordered burger that french fries I supposed to order additionally. Usually cashier is asking do I want set or do I want sometjing else.. I assumed that if I didn't specify I'll get a set. But burger was ok, easy snack between brunch and nice dinner just to fill up yor tommy and run for the next museum. :-) Not too big not too small and anough green inside :-). From US burgers I had inpression they should be bigger, so for me the proper size was a pleasant surprise. I really liked the way local staff was dealing with one junky man, politely sending him away. No insauls, no raising voice.. Good management!

data.title: Very good burguer
data.text:
Very good burgers when you consider that they are a fast food chain. A bit different than Five Guys, but both are my favorite chains.
I've had the Shack Burger, which has a very juicy and tasty hamburger. I also tried the Shack-cago hotdog, which was ok, and the Shroom Burger, which also was ok. My recommendation is to stick with the first one.
The cheese fries are also a good choice.

data.title: Great Burger
data.text: I had a SmokeShack Burger which was great.  Good tasting burger and the fries were good as well. Worth a visit.  Stay away from the Mushroom Burger as it doesn't have any meat (unless you're a vegetarian than you will enjoy it) .

data.title: Perfect end to a hard stressful day of moving
data.text: Grabbed a quick burger and fries for dinner at the end of the day of moving furniture. Best burger I've ever had-moist, tender and tasty and ready with not too long a wait.

data.title: Good place
data.text: We just popped in to put off our hunger. The staff were friendly. The burgers were delicious and fast-made. Fortunately it is not crowdy at all.

data.title: Good place for a quick burger
data.text: Stopped by while out shopping with the kids.The burgers were good. My daughter had a yummy milkshake. We had the best frozen custard for dessert.
